mods.abstract: Three color window card (red, blue, and yellow on white) announcing the Shrewsbury Folk Festival featuring KT Tunstall, Richard Thompson, Show of Hands, Kate Rusby, Blowzabella, The Sweetback Sisters, Anxo Lorenzo, Karine Polwart, Kathryn Roberts and Caroline Herring, Treacherous Orchestra, Lau, Jon Boden and the Remmant Kings, Jonathan Byrd, Vamm, Vin Garbutt, Faustus, and Old Man Luedecke at West Mid Showground on August 24-27. Poster features a woodcut of a circus tent.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
